head.title: Grandville Public Schools - Improving Lives by Producing Successful, Lifelong Learners

meta.name: description
meta.content: Known for its committed faculty, Grandville Public Schools has been serving K-12 students for more than a century. Welcome!

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Grandville Public Schools, Grandville Schools, Grandville Bulldogs, Grandville Public School District

img.alt: Collage of the front exteriors of nine brick schools
students wear goggles in chemistry while combining solutions in glass protective area

div.p: If you can dream it, you can do it. Grandville graduates have the skills to be responsible, contributing citizens in a changing world.

img.alt: parents outside with son by fence in backyard
5 teachers stand by big G outside of school
marching band brass instrument players on field

div.p: Our art and music classes begin as early as kindergarten.

img.alt: Athletic entrance with glass and blue night sky

div.p: Our athletics program ranks among the top 5% in Michigan per Niche.

img.alt: A collage of photos of teachers.

div.p: Our teachers & staff are here to help.

img.alt: girl in plaid works on circuit on circuit board on table
three boys read outside and point at book together on grass
marching band on field at night
boy slaps hand in gym with coaches
teacher shows two high school boys a machine part
marching band performs with train and smoke stack
cast of six high school students acts out You Can't Beat the House play on stage
boy runs with football with football team on field
boy lacrosse player in white tries to get ball on ground with boy in red behind him

div.div: Find closing, food service and academic updates during our coronavirus closure.
